TEXT.TITLE: CALIFORNIA ENERGY <CECI> INITIAL OFFER STARTS
TEXT.BODY: California Energy Co Inc said an initial public offering of 1,900,000 common shares is underway at 7.50 dlrs each through underwriters led by Laidlaw Adams and Peck Inc. The geothermal power company said the offering is expected to close March 19. Reuter
